scripts.headful:vps: sh -c 'XDG_RUNTIME_DIR=${XDG_RUNTIME_DIR:-/tmp/runtime-$(id -u)}; mkdir -p "$XDG_RUNTIME_DIR" && chmod 700 "$XDG_RUNTIME_DIR"; xvfb-run -a --server-args="-screen 0 1440x900x24" node index.js --headless=false "$@"' --
scripts.headful:vps:auto: sh -c 'XDG_RUNTIME_DIR=${XDG_RUNTIME_DIR:-/tmp/runtime-$(id -u)}; mkdir -p "$XDG_RUNTIME_DIR" && chmod 700 "$XDG_RUNTIME_DIR"; xvfb-run -a --server-args="-screen 0 1440x900x24" node index.js --headless=false --net=auto "$@"' --
